name: Q.U.I.R.K.
description:
• Capture The Flag is now LIVE in the Q.U.I.R.K. Summer Expansion!

    Welcome to Q.U.I.R.K.
    Q.U.I.R.K. is a game that PC and Mac gamers can play together, and it's compatible with the HTC Vive! Join coop matches against AI or go straight-up PVP! Directed by user feedback and fueled by user generated content, regular updates will give players more of the things they enjoy, and less of the things that suck.

    Currently, you can build and play multi-player death matches with an ever-expanding list of special weapons and in-game tools like:
    • Jet Packs
    • Bazookas
    • Stun Guns
    • Grappling Plunger
    • A wide variety of blocks and special art assets with a host of colors and functions

    Prior to launch, future updates will allow you to build, share, and play new Q.U.I.R.K. game types like:
    • King of the Hill
    • Sports Ball Arena
    • Tower Defense
    • And the many, many game types that will be suggested by our community.
